arts.ttl: Empoli director Corsi: “Vasquez to Palermo? No, we will redeem Devis from Milan”
arts.sum: Empoli have once again demonstrated their knack for identifying and nurturing goalkeeping talent. Following the successful stints of Guglielmo Vicario, who was sold to Tottenham Hotspur for a substantial fee, and Elia Caprile, who impressed during his loan spell before returning to Napoli, the Tuscan club has struck gold with their latest acquisition, Devis Vásquez.
